issue.title: Sort orders in backend desc
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

The list of orders are sorted from the oldest to the newest. It must be from the newest to the oldest.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Hi thomas !
I can do it, if you're OK with it

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

rev. 9121
I also displayed the ID (usefull + add the sort on title)
